item.description:
Cambridge SEO Group meets the first monday of each month.

However the asst. organizer will be on a road trip from Arizona back to Boston & another member is expecting a child on the 4rth. So we moved it out a week.

We invite local Boston seo, affiliate marketing and search engine marketing professionals in New England to join us.

We also invite local Boston business owners to be our guest website's to be reviewed.


Guest Speaker's Wanted:

We've been working hard to find industry experts and to develop a formal agenda to keep it interesting for all those that attend.


March 12th Agenda:

6:45pm to 7pm: Get Your Food/Drinks and Network

7pm: Business Card Bowl: drop you card in and we will try to make copies for all that attend, before the end of the event.

7pm to 7:45: 2 Min Elevator Pitch:

* Tell us about you and your business or website interest
* Share something personaly that most people wouldn't know about you?
* Share your networking goals with the group

7:45 to 8pm:

Guest Speaker:

Scott Smigler
President
Exclusive Concepts, Inc
http://www.exclusivec...

SEO Client Case Study

Presentation Called: -in the trenches with clients-

8:00pm to 8:15pm:

Guest Speaker

Eric J. Hansen
Founder
SiteSpect
http://www.sitespect....

Presentation: - Few points about conversion rate optimization using A/B and multivariate testing -

8:15 to 8:30pm Best Websites & Tools: Share your urls & Whats Working? Group Discussion to share success stories of what else is working?

8:30 to 8:45pm: Share Your SEO Tips: Please post within your rsvp your url and then please take the time to review other sites listed prior to the meeting and write out your seo tips to exchange with fellow members.

8:45 to 9:00 pm: Open Roundtable Challenge Discussion: Please be specific about your challenges in your business or website. 3 to 5 min max spent on any one business model.

9:00pm: Stand up and network or go home


We look forward to seeing you all at this informal Boston search engine round table discussion!


The Cambridge SEO MeetUp

group.name: The Cambridge Search Engine Optimization Meetup Group

item.name: The 15th Cambridge Search Engine Optimization March Meetup
